info.title: Trace-FOSS - OpenAPI Documentation
info.description: Trace-FOSS is a system for tracking parts along the supply chain. A high level of transparency across the supplier network enables faster intervention based on a recorded event in the supply chain. This saves costs by seamlessly tracking parts and creates trust through clearly defined and secure data access by the companies and persons involved in the process.

get.description: The endpoint returns a result of BPN EDC URL mappings.

put.description: The endpoint updates BPN EDC URL mappings

200.description: Returns the paged result found for BpnEdcMapping

post.description: The endpoint creates BPN EDC URL mappings

200.description: Returns the paged result found for BpnEdcMapping

post.description: The endpoint starts investigations based on part ids provided.
The endpoint updates investigations by their id.
The endpoint closes investigations by their id.
The endpoint cancles investigations by their id.
The endpoint approves investigations by their id.
The endpoint Triggers EDC notification contract based on notification type and method
The endpoint synchronizes the assets from irs.
The endpoint searchs for assets by id and returns a list of them.

200.description: Returns the paged result found for Asset

get.description: The endpoint returns an asset filtered by id .

patch.description: The endpoint updates asset by provided quality type.

get.description: The endpoint Triggers reload of shell descriptors.
The endpoint gets metrics for database.

200.description: Returns the paged result found for Asset

get.description: The endpoint returns investigations as paged result by their id.
The endpoint returns received investigations as paged result.

200.description: Returns the paged result found for Asset

get.description: The endpoint returns created investigations as paged result.

200.description: Returns the paged result found for Asset

get.description: The endpoint can return limited data based on the user role
The endpoint returns a paged result of assets.

get.description: The endpoint returns an asset filtered by child id.
The endpoint returns a map for assets consumed by the map.

delete.description: The endpoint deletes BPN EDC URL mappings
